title: Mister Robot Touch
description:
With the ‘Mister Robot Touch ‘App, you can use the following functions:
[Remote control] Remote control and setup of the robot anytime and anywhere
[Status View] Real time view of the working status of the robot
[Work Data] View the cleaning data of the robot
[Set Appointment] Set a scheduled cleaning task to automatically start working
[Do Not Disturb Mode] Set the Do Not Disturb time so that the robot will not disturb your rest
[Firmware Upgrade] Get feature updates and enjoy a better intelligent life
[Device sharing] Share the device with family and friends to use it together
descriptionHTML:

[Device sharing] Share the device with family and friends to use it together
